Text:
I'm seeding this now and there are 4-5 leechers even though it doesn't show in the info above....
Right now I seeded a 1.75 ratio!
How do I open this? What do I do with a .LA file?
Oh, forget it. (I should read first, then ask)
this version is missing the sound files from the cutscenes, that's why you get no sound during the cutscenes. correct me if i'm wrong though

I found out that these files are only missing the cutscene sound file.
It's around 7 mb.
I'll try to uploaded to another torrent :)

I uploaded the cutscene sound files torrent.
now seeding!

Works great, followed the instructions as given in the description. Just download the scummvm thing, and then run the folder - i had to move the folder into program files so it would show up for some reason.

Thanks so much to the uploader, i loved this game as a kid and am very grateful for thwe great job you did.

hi! downloaded this and it worked perfectly. until episode 3 in the game begins, then it just shuts down! ??
anyone else who have experienced this problem??
anyone know how to save the game?
To save a game, press F5 during the game to enter ScummVM basic options.  It'll be common sense from there.
please, someone seed the comi-cutscene-mp3s. thanks!
Exactly what I was looking for, thankyou quakehead :) I've been wondering why people continue to make and seed full ISO's of SCUMMVM compatible games :D

ScummVM site shows it is only90% compatible with this game!

http://www.scummvm.org/compatibility/

Anybody knows what the hell does that mean? What's there in the remaining 10%?
How do I get the sound to run during cutscenes? I've downloaded the comi_cutscenes_mp3, but how do I get it to run? thanks!
